Comment: It's terrifying what's going on in South Africa. Armed criminals are raiding white-owned farms with signal jammers so they can't call the police, and what happens afterwards is too horrible to even describe.  There were a lot of cases in 2024 where these signal-jamming attacks in the US too, perpetuated by foreign gangs operating operating on our soil.
Author: Magehunter_Skassi

Comment: Exactly why our borders should be 100% secured.
